mainBoard.name: Moment of Craving
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Moment of Craving tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't gain 2 life.

The target creature will still be on the battlefield when you gain life, even if its toughness has been reduced to 0 or less. Any abilities it has that interact with gaining life do so as appropriate. If any abilities trigger on you gaining life, the creature will be put into its owner's graveyard after that ability triggers but before it resolves.

Los Vampiros atacantes que controlas tienen las habilidades de toque mortal y vínculo vital. (Cualquier cantidad de daño que hagan a una criatura es suficiente para destruirla. El daño hecho por esas criaturas también hace que su controlador gane esa misma cantidad de vidas.)
Siempre que un Vampiro que controlas muera, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si lo haces, roba una carta.

À chaque fois qu'un vampire que vous contrôlez meurt, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous faites ainsi, piochez une carte.

Ogniqualvolta un Vampiro che controlli muore, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se lo fai, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Contrairement aux familles les plus vaniteuses d'Innistrad, les vampires de Stromkirk préfèrent user de discrétion et de subterfuge.
foreignData.name: Voleuse de sang de Stromkirk
foreignData.text: Au début de votre étape de fin, si un adversaire a perdu des points de vie ce tour-ci, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur un vampire ciblé que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText: A differenza delle famiglie vampire più vistose, i vampiri Stromkirk prediligono il silenzio e il sotterfugio.
foreignData.name: Ladra di Sangue di Stromkirk
foreignData.text: All'inizio della tua sottofase finale, se un avversario ha perso punti vita in questo turno, metti un segnalino +1/+1 su un Vampiro bersaglio che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: イニストラードの虚飾に満ちた吸血鬼の氏族と違い、流城の吸血鬼は沈黙と策略に矜持を持つ。
foreignData.name: 流城の血泥棒
foreignData.text: あなたの終了ステップの開始時に、このターンに対戦相手がライフを失っていた場合、あなたがコントロールしている吸血鬼１体を対象とする。それの上に＋１/＋１カウンター１個を置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼・ならず者

mainBoard.name: Stromkirk Bloodthief
mainBoard.originalText: At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target Vampire you control.

rulings.text: Stromkirk Bloodthief's ability cares whether an opponent lost life this turn, not how their life total changed. For example, an opponent who gained 2 life and lost 1 life in the same turn still lost life.

mainBoard.text: At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target Vampire you control.

{T}: Agrega un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.name: 未知なる安息地
foreignData.text:
この土地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

mainBoard.name: Uncharted Haven
mainBoard.originalText:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

rulings.text: If Uncharted Haven is somehow on the battlefield without a chosen color, its mana ability won't make any mana.
